title: Public Relations Specialist Job at OPPO
content:
OPPO, founded in 2004, is one of the world’s leading innovators in smart devices and mobile technology. With operations in over 60 countries and regions, OPPO is dedicated to delivering cutting-edge innovation, premium user experiences, and stylish designs. In Nigeria, OPPO continues to expand its footprint with over 290,000 points of sale and 1,900 official service centers—bringing the beauty of technology closer to people every day.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Public Relations Specialist

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Assist in managing and enhancing the public image and reputation of the organization
	Develop and implement strategic communication plans to promote media coverage, brand awareness, and strong relationships with the public, media, and stakeholders
	Manage key opinion leaders (KOLs), write newsletters, respond to media inquiries, and monitor public opinion
	Collaborate with internal teams and external partners to ensure messaging is clear, consistent, and aligned with organizational goals.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Communications, Public Relations, Marketing, or a related field is an advantage
	1–3 years of experience in public relations, communications, or related roles
	Excellent writing, speaking, and storytelling skills
	Strong team player with the ability to work cross-functionally
	Knowledge of media trends and PR strategies.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cvpool2021@oppo-aed.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
